summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6203 for the improvement of 35th Avenue West from Thurman Street to approximately 250 feet north thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 88261, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
